snippet.title: Nuclear Blaze - Release trailer
snippet.description:
Nuclear Blaze is an action adventure game, crafted with love, featuring the smooth "signature" gameplay from the guy who was in charge on Dead Cells.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1662480/Nuclear_Blaze/

Explore a unique 2D firefighting game, with all the devastating backdrafts, exploding walls and sprinklers you could expect. Fight your way through a mysterious facility and try to keep the blaze under control!


Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1662480/Nuclear_Blaze/
Deepnight Games website: https://deepnight.net

Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/deepnightfr
